pages.text: These enhancements will improve certain aspects of the machine like speed and energy usage.$(br2)The machine will use enhancements inserted in the 4 right-side slots on its interface.
This enhancement will increase the machine's processing speed at cost of energy.
This enhancement will decrease the machine's energy cost.
This enhancement will increase the machine's internal energy capacity.
This enhancement will make the Electric Furnace accept Blast Furnace recipes.
This enhancement will make the Electric Furnace accept Smoker recipes.
